title: Update UI branding and metadata to Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa

requirements.summary: Replace all visible UI branding text from “Beauty Parlour” to “Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa” in header and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text shows exactly "Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa" (instead of "Beauty Parlour").
Footer brand text shows exactly "Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa" (instead of "Beauty Parlour").
Footer copyright line uses "Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa".

file_operations.description: Update the header brand text to exactly “Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa” anywhere the header currently displays “Beauty Parlour” (keep logo file unchanged). Optionally align the logo alt text with the new business name while preserving the same image asset.
Update footer brand text and the copyright line to exactly use “Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa” instead of “Beauty Parlour” (keep existing layout, links, and logo asset unchanged).

requirements.summary: Update SEO and social sharing title metadata to use “Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa”.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML document <title> includes "Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa".

file_operations.description: Replace occurrences of “Beauty Parlour” in the document <title>, og:title, and twitter:title meta tags so each includes “Bhagyashree Makeover & Spa”, preserving other descriptive wording and keeping existing social image references unchanged.
